General.Name: KC Feed Co. Ltd
General.Description: KC Feed Co., Ltd. produces and sells livestock feed in South Korea. It offers feed for laying hen, pig, domestic cow, and others, as well as for family site. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Yeongcheon-si, South Korea.
